scripts.start: P=`ps ax | grep 'index.js -i transmitter' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}'`; if [ "$P" != "" ];then echo 'Server has started'; else echo 'Start server'; `NODE_ENV=development nohup node index.js -i transmitter >> logs/server.log 2>&1 &`; ps ax | grep 'index.js -i transmitter' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}' > logs/server.pid; fi
scripts.stop: P=`ps ax | grep 'index.js -i transmitter' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}'`; if [ "$P" != "" ];then kill $P; rm logs/server.pid; echo 'Stop server'; else echo 'Server not found';fi
